snippet.title: Mr. DRILLER DrillLand – Opening Animation
snippet.description:
The opening animation for Mr. DRILLER DrillLand is here! Join forces with your friends and dig to uncover buried treasure, when #MrDriller DrillLand arrives June 25th, 2020 for #NintendoSwitch and #Steam! 



Follow Bandai Namco Entertainment: 
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/bandainamcous
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/BandaiNamcoUS
Twitter: https://twitter.com/BandaiNamcoUS/
Tumblr: http://bandainamcous.tumblr.com/
Twitch: http://www.twitch.tv/bandainamcous
